feed.title: Sparkour
feed.subtitle: An open-source collection of programming recipes for Apache Spark

entry.title: Spark Update
entry.summary: All recipes have been updated and tested for Spark 2.4.5.

entry.title: Recipe Update
entry.summary: The recipes, Configuring Amazon S3 as a Spark Data Source and Configuring Spark to Use Amazon S3, have been updated to reflect the deprecation of the s3n protocol in favor of s3a.

entry.title: Spark Update
entry.summary: All recipes have been updated and tested for Spark 2.4.4.
